first_para: Helen Mary Jones (born 24 December 1954) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Warrington North since 1997. Andrew Roth of the Guardian describes her as an: "intelligent, battle hardened leftwing solicitor built into the Labour machine" She was Vice-Chamberlain of the Household from 2009 to 2010.

full.extract:
Helen Mary Jones (born 24 December 1954) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Warrington North since 1997. Andrew Roth of the Guardian describes her as an: "intelligent, battle hardened leftwing solicitor built into the Labour machine" She was Vice-Chamberlain of the Household from 2009 to 2010.
^ "House of Commons - The Register of Members' Financial Interests - Part 2: Part 2". Publications.parliament.uk. Retrieved 2012-06-04. 
^ "Ask Aristotle: Helen Jones". The Guardian (London). Retrieved 2007-05-31.
full.title: Helen Jones
